Package jcckit.data

Class DataCurve

java.lang.Object
jcckit.data.DataContainer
jcckit.data.DataCurve
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataElement
public class DataCurve extends DataContainer implements DataElement
A curve is a DataContainer of DataPoints.
